comment.author: 80878055@N00
comment._content: Armagh swimming baths, Folly Lane Armagh. Formerly a reservoir for the city's water supply and now the site of Armagh Leisure centre. The house in the background is Greenfield Manse belonging to the 3rd Presbyterian congregation. maps.google.co.uk/maps?hl=en&ll=54.344406,-6.642388&a...
